name: Ricochet (itch) (Fun_Master_Ed)
description:
READ THE DESCRIPTION BEFORE YOU PLAY!

This is Ricochet. 1 Bullet, 10 Bounces. 

In this game, both sides are mirrored to face each other.

 You play as the left one, and your goal is to survive the bullet while damaging the mirrored self. 

This game has many solutions and if you can't do it one way, figure out another :)

First 2D Game 😬

CONTROLS: 

ARROW KEYS TO MOVE/ JUMP

Aim: Move Mouse - You Control the left character 

Shoot: Left Click

WARNING: THE BULLETS MAY GET STUCK SO USE R TO RESTART :)

Details: 

I made this game within 24 hours, along with learning how 2D works lol

Music from Open Game Art

Art by Me (I'm so sorry for it being that bad)
